resources.string:
Balances for Whitgift School is an app which allows you to check your lunch and tuck balances, view your recent purchase history and notifies you when your balances are low.

This app is developed by a student of Whitgift School. This app is not affiliated with Whitgift School or WisePay.

To proceed, you will need your WisePay username and password in hand. If you are a student, ask a parent/guardian or the School Office for the login details.
Enter your WisePay account details below. Your account will only be stored on your device.
Balances can check when your balances are low on a daily basis and alert you when your balances fall below a specified threshold.
